entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -33.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 04:54 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -33.1°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -37.0°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 33. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
